alert.note: Alert for Portage (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 3:36AM EST until November 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the northern half of the county with less than 2 inches expected south of Kent and Ravenna. * WHERE...Portage county. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to push south into the area early Tuesday morning with rates in excess of 1 inch per hour in the heaviest snow bands. The greatest accumulations are expected across northern portions of the county with impacts to the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
